thread.title: 28-year-old man critical in Brooklyn shooting: cops
thread.title_full: 28-year-old man critical in Brooklyn shooting: cops - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: 28-year-old man critical in Brooklyn shooting: cops
text:
Alex Rud A man was shot in the chest in the vestibule of this East New York home Sunday morning, police say. A 28-year-old man was clinging to life after he was shot in the chest in Brooklyn Sunday morning, police said.
The man, whose name was not immediately released, was attacked in the vestibule of a two-story Van Siclen Ave. home near Pitkin Ave. in East New York around 10:15 a.m., authorities said.
The suspect — clad in a black hoodie, black pants and carrying a black bag — took off on foot towards Pitkin Ave., police said.
Emergency responders rushed the victim to Brookdale University Hospital and Medical Center, where he was listed in critical condition, according to officials.
Police were searching for the gunman Sunday morning.
rsit@nydailynews.com
